body.p: I hereby tender my resignation as 3rd Lieutenant in the Maderia Guards

S J B Phelps
3rd Lieutenant
Ky State Guard
3" Regiment
Resignation
3 Lieut W. B. Phelps
July 9 1861

Approved
H T Buckner
Lieut Col com
